title: Address issues with ETW traces in Evaluator

nodes.body:
Yes the count needs to be fixed if this profiling is to be left in there - trying to understand if there is value in this given https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/blob/master/documentation/evaluation-profiling.md. 

I am the only consumer of this data at the moment. You can keep it parked on me for the moment and I'll fix it or revert it once I get things rolling on #6034.
@arkalyanms, do you have a timeline on when you're planning to tackle this?

Bump @arkalyanms.

Note that while you may be the only consumer, everyone uses evaluate, and #5978 worsened evaluate's perf.
